alert.note: Alert for Seward; Stevens (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 4:05PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Seward and southeastern Stevens Counties through 500 PM CDT... At 404 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Tyrone, or near Liberal, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Liberal and Hayne. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
